item.description:
Our next meditation meet up will be September 28th at 7:30 pm. The topic for this session will be "The Art of Meditation."

This will be an opportunity to meditate as well as be with people desiring to grow in consciousness. I am looking forward seeing you. Contact me if you have any questions,

Rev. Christine

PS: If you cannot attend this meet up, but are interested in the topic, I will have a meditation meet up in Jamaica Plain with the same topic on October 1st at 7:30 pm. Contact me for location details.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ring the bell at the front door; you can park in driveway
item.name: September Meditation Meetup: The Art of Meditation
